name: Billplz Sdn Bhd.
description: Provider of an online payment gateway designed to initiate automate and cashless bill payment system. The company's online payment gateway provides a fully secure payment portal where users can share the confidential bank details, enabling users to be assured of safety and privacy.
one_liner: Provider of an online payment gateway designed to initiate automate and cashless bill payment system. The company's online payment gateway provides a fully secure payment portal where users can share the confidential bank details, enabling users to be assured of safety and privacy.
